vlive.korean: 이 모든 전자제품과 모든 소프트웨어를... 소프트웨어는 중국에서 만들지 않는군요. Every electronic and every software... Ah, China doesn't make software. 듣기 View video KIM DONG WAN : 2018 신화 활동 마무리
vlive.english: Every electronic and every software... Ah, China doesn't make software.

vlive.korean: 소프트웨어 업그레이드가 떠있네요. It says, you have to upgrade software. 듣기 View video Show! Music core : 쇼! 음악중심 '5분 딜레이~' Show! Music core
vlive.english: It says, you have to upgrade software.

vlive.korean: V LIVE를 켜는데 핸드폰이 자동으로 소프트웨어 업데이트가 됐어요. When I turned on V LIVE, my mobile phone was automatically updated. 듣기 View video Girl's Day : [걸스데이] 토요일 유라는..?
vlive.english: When I turned on V LIVE, my mobile phone was automatically updated.

vlive.korean: 죄송해요. 제가 원래 방송으로 쓰던 핸드폰 소프트웨어가 오류가 있었어요. I'm very sorry. Actually, the cellphone I used to use for broadcasting had an error. 듣기 View video V Beauty : 민가든 여행시 유용해! 여름 뷰티 파우치템 Summer travel pouch!
vlive.english: I'm very sorry. Actually, the cellphone I used to use for broadcasting had an error.

vlive.korean: 자동통역하기에 너무... For a translation software, this is too... 듣기 View video HIGHLIGHT : ♡ HAPPY DUJUN DAY ♡
vlive.english: For a translation software, this is too...

examples.korean: The security software he uses is home brew. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 사용하는 보안 소프트웨어는 자가 제작물이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The security software he uses is home brew. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The new software is being pitched at banks. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 새 소프트웨어는 은행들을 대상 고객으로 잡고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The new software is being pitched at banks. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You can customize the software in several ways. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 소프트웨어는 여러 가지 방식으로 원하는 대로 바꿀 수가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
